subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: On the night Brendan Shanahan returned to play, the stretcher made a chilling return Wednesday night as Philadelphia’s Todd Fedoruk was knocked cold by the Rangers’ Colton Orr.
snippet: On the night Brendan Shanahan returned to play, the stretcher made a chilling return Wednesday night as Philadelphia’s Todd Fedoruk was knocked cold by the Rangers’ Colton Orr.
